Description: 2006 Gibson USA Flying V Red Sparkle Mirror Pick Guard RH Electric Guitar100% GenuineHigh QualityFast Shipping Pre-owned, in very good condition. Fully tested, works perfectly and sounds awesome. No cracks anywhere. A couple of dings on the body, at the tips of the V, as is common with these guitars. All original, down to the pots and knobs. Not missing any screws. Includes original Gibson case. Some light fading and discoloration on the fretboard and body from use. Mirrored pickguard barely shows any signs of play. Does not include anything aside from the guitar and case. Some light fading and discoloration on the fretboard and body from use. Mirrored pickguard barely shows any signs of play. Does not include anything aside from the guitar and case.
